verses.verse: Then <S%G1899><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> after <S%G1223><s%> I went <S%G305><s%> up again <S%G3825><s%> to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> with Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> and took <S%G4838><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> with me also. <S%G2532><s%>

And I went <S%G305><s%> up by revelation, <S%G602><s%> and communicated <S%G394><s%> to them that gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I preach <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> but privately <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> to them which were of reputation, <S%G1380><s%> lest <S%G3381><s%> by any <S%G3381><s%> means <S%G4458><s%> I should run, <S%G5143><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> had run, <S%G5143><s%> in vain. <S%G2756><s%>
But neither <S%G3761><s%> Titus, <S%G5103><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> was with me, being <S%G5607><s%> a Greek, <S%G1672><s%> was compelled <S%G315><s%> to be circumcised: <S%G4059><s%>

And that because <S%G1223><s%> of false <S%G5569><s%> brothers <S%G5569><s%> unawares <S%G3920><s%> brought <S%G3920><s%> in, who <S%G3748><s%> came <S%G3922><s%> in privately <S%G3922><s%> to spy <S%G2684><s%> out our liberty <S%G1657><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that they might bring <S%G2615><s%> us into bondage: <S%G2615><s%>

To whom <S%G3739><s%> we gave <S%G1502><s%> place <S%G1502><s%> by subjection, <S%G5292><s%> no, not for an hour; <S%G5610><s%> that the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> might continue <S%G1265><s%> with you.

But of these who seemed <S%G1380><s%> to be somewhat, <S%G5100><s%> (whatever <S%G3697><s%> <S%G4219><s%> they were, it makes <S%G1308><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> matter <S%G1308><s%> to me: God <S%G2316><s%> accepts <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> person: <S%G4383><s%>) for they who seemed <S%G1380><s%> to be somewhat in conference <S%G4323><s%> added <S%G4323><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> to me:

But contrariwise, <S%G5121><s%> when they saw <S%G1492><s%> that the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> was committed <S%G4100><s%> to me, as the gospel of the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> was to Peter; <S%G4074><s%>

(For he that worked <S%G1754><s%> effectually <S%G1754><s%> in Peter <S%G4074><s%> to the apostleship <S%G651><s%> of the circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> the same <S%G2532><s%> was mighty <S%G1754><s%> in me toward <S%G1519><s%> the Gentiles: <S%G1484><s%>)

And when James, <S%G2385><s%> Cephas, <S%G2786><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> seemed <S%G1380><s%> to be pillars, <S%G4769><s%> perceived <S%G1097><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that was given <S%G1325><s%> to me, they gave <S%G1325><s%> to me and Barnabas <S%G921><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hands <S%G1188><s%> of fellowship; <S%G2842><s%> that we should go to the heathen, <S%G1484><s%> and they to the circumcision. <S%G4061><s%>

Only <S%G3440><s%> they would that we should remember <S%G3421><s%> the poor; <S%G4434><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> was forward <S%G4704><s%> to do. <S%G4160><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> was come <S%G2064><s%> to Antioch, <S%G490><s%> I withstood <S%G436><s%> him to the face, <S%G4383><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he was to be blamed. <S%G2607><s%>

For before <S%G4253><s%> that certain <S%G5100><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from James, <S%G2385><s%> he did eat <S%G4906><s%> with the Gentiles: <S%G1484><s%> but when <S%G3753><s%> they were come, <S%G2064><s%> he withdrew <S%G5288><s%> and separated <S%G873><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> fearing <S%G5399><s%> them which were of the circumcision. <S%G4061><s%>

And the other <S%G3062><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> dissembled <S%G4942><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> with him; so <S%G5620><s%> that Barnabas <S%G921><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was carried <S%G4879><s%> away <S%G4879><s%> with their dissimulation. <S%G5272><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> that they walked <S%G3716><s%> not uprightly <S%G3716><s%> according <S%G4314><s%> to the truth <S%G225><s%> of the gospel, <S%G2098><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> to Peter <S%G4074><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them all, <S%G3956><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you, being <S%G5225><s%> a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> after the manner <S%G1483><s%> of Gentiles, <S%G1483><s%> and not as do the Jews, <S%G2452><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> compel <S%G315><s%> you the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to live <S%G2198><s%> as do the Jews? <S%G2450><s%>
We who are Jews <S%G2453><s%> by nature, <S%G5449><s%> and not sinners <S%G268><s%> of the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that a man <S%G444><s%> is not justified <S%G1344><s%> by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> but by the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> in Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that we might be justified <S%G1344><s%> by the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and not by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law: <S%G3551><s%> for by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> shall no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> be justified. <S%G1344><s%>

But if, <S%G1487><s%> while we seek <S%G2212><s%> to be justified <S%G1344><s%> by Christ, <S%G5547><s%> we ourselves also <S%G2532><s%> are found <S%G2147><s%> sinners, <S%G268><s%> is therefore <S%G686><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the minister <S%G1249><s%> of sin? <S%G266><s%> God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%>
For if <S%G1487><s%> I build <S%G3618><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> I destroyed, <S%G2647><s%> I make <S%G4921><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> a transgressor. <S%G3848><s%>
For I through <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> am dead <S%G599><s%> to the law, <S%G3551><s%> that I might live <S%G2198><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

I am crucified <S%G4957><s%> with Christ: <S%G5547><s%> nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> I live; <S%G2198><s%> yet <S%G3765><s%> not I, but Christ <S%G5547><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> in me: and the life which <S%G3739><s%> I now <S%G3568><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> I live <S%G2198><s%> by the faith <S%G4102><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> me, and gave <S%G3860><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for me.

I do not frustrate <S%G114><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> come by the law, <S%G3551><s%> then <S%G686><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is dead <S%G599><s%> in vain. <S%G1432><s%>
